title: Strong Rule of Law
description: In 2023, Ghana had 16 sources reporting on the rule of law, indicating a strong legal framework and adherence to legal principles.

title: Efficient Labor Regulations
description: Ghana scored 91.08 in 2024 for the operational efficiency of labor regulations and public services, showcasing a highly efficient labor market.

title: High Benefit Incidence to the Poorest
description: In 2016, 57.56% of social safety net benefits in Ghana were directed to the poorest quintile, highlighting effective targeting of social programs.

title: Negative Other Taxes
description: In 2022, Ghana reported a negative value of -4.26% for other taxes as a percentage of revenue, indicating a unique fiscal situation.
